events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't been updated for several days, and I'm quite frustrated waiting this long.
The reported problem relates to a delayed shipment and lack of tracking updates, so it has been categorized under Delivery Delay for proper handling.
A support agent has been assigned to review the shipping status and respond to the customer regarding the delay.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your order is delayed and I’m here to help find out what happened and resolve this issue promptly.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can track the package and check for any updates or issues?
Sure, the order number is 987654321 and it was shipped to 123 Elm Street, Springfield. I haven’t seen any new tracking info for three days.
I have checked with the carrier, and it appears there was an unexpected delay at the sorting facility. We expect delivery within the next 3 days. We will monitor the shipment and keep you updated.
Thanks for checking, but I’m really disappointed with how long this is taking. I hope it doesn’t get lost or delayed further.
Due to the customer's dissatisfaction and the delay, I’m escalating this issue to senior support to prioritize the tracking and resolution.
Your package has now been delivered as of today. We apologize for the delay and appreciate your patience. Please confirm once you have received it.
Just checking in to ensure you received your order and that everything is in good condition. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since the delivery issue has been resolved and no further complaints were received, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your understanding.
